bibl.title: Strategies for Survival. Widows in the Context of their Social Relationships.
bibl.note: Diss. Univ. of Chicago. Summary in DA 65 (2004-2005) p. 3941-A. - Chapter 3 examines documentary papyri from Hellenistic and Roman Egypt.
